item.description:
Hi Folks,
To take a break from all the rock-hard stuff of recent meetings, Michelle has agreed to present to us her paper "The Role of Emotion in Decision and Moral Evaluation" that she gave recently at the American Philosophical Society meeting in San Francisco. As always, looking forward to getting together.
See you there

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Next Meeting: Michelle presents "The Role of Emotion..."
